name: list_of_games
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cheapshark_game_deals.
Tool description: CheapShark is a price comparison website for digital PC Games. We keep track of prices across multiple stores including Steam, GreenManGaming, Fanatical, and many others.
API description: Fetches a list of games that contain the given title or match the specified Steam App ID. The response includes the cheapest current deal for each game.

title.description: The title of the game to search for. Defaults to 'batman'.

exact.description: Flag to allow only exact string matches for the `title` parameter. Defaults to 0.

limit.description: The maximum number of games to return, up to 60. Defaults to 60.

steamappid.description: Search for a game by Steamâ€™s AppID - e.g. http://store.steampowered.com/app/35140/
